name: Next.js Security Headers (CSP/Strict-Transport)
description: CSP等のセキュリティヘッダを付与するmiddleware雛形。

files.template:
import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
export function middleware(){ const res = NextResponse.next(); res.headers.set('content-security-policy', "default-src 'self'"); res.headers.set('strict-transport-security','max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload'); return res; }
